name: Germs Against Humanity
description:
The best cleaning products eliminate 99.9% of germs! Can you be the only .1% to survive the most? 

In Germs Against Humanity, you can play with up to 4 players to see which Germ can survive the most, as humanity continues to try to wash their hands.

Because Germs are simple life forms, you only have one input to control your Germ.
